Structure# Date.ComponentsFormatStyle.Style

iOS 15.0+iPadOS 15.0+Mac Catalyst 15.0+macOS 12.0+tvOS 15.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 8.0+

```
struct Style
```

## [Topics](/documentation/foundation/date/componentsformatstyle/style-swift.struct#topics)

### [Type Properties](/documentation/foundation/date/componentsformatstyle/style-swift.struct#Type-Properties)

[`static var abbreviated: Date.ComponentsFormatStyle.Style`](/documentation/foundation/date/componentsformatstyle/style-swift.struct/abbreviated)Shows the fields in the abbreviation. For example, “2 hr, 10 min”, “2小時10分鐘”[`static var condensedAbbreviated: Date.ComponentsFormatStyle.Style`](/documentation/foundation/date/componentsformatstyle/style-swift.struct/condensedabbreviated)Uses the abbreviated form but condensed if possible. For example, “2hr 10min”, “2小時10分鐘”[`static var narrow: Date.ComponentsFormatStyle.Style`](/documentation/foundation/date/componentsformatstyle/style-swift.struct/narrow)Shows the fields in the shortest form possible. For example, “2h 10m”, “2時10分”[`static var spellOut: Date.ComponentsFormatStyle.Style`](/documentation/foundation/date/componentsformatstyle/style-swift.struct/spellout)Values are spelled out and fields are displayed in their full name. For example, “two hours, ten minutes”, “2小時10分鐘”[`static var wide: Date.ComponentsFormatStyle.Style`](/documentation/foundation/date/componentsformatstyle/style-swift.struct/wide)Shows the fields in their full spelling. For example, “2 hour, 10 minutes”, “2小時10分鐘”## [Relationships](/documentation/foundation/date/componentsformatstyle/style-swift.struct#relationships)
